name: Lil' King Adventures
description:
This is an incomplete level editor for our first collaborative project Lil'King Adventures.  

  • You can spawn blocks by clicking the panels around the cube on the top right.  
  • The keys 1, 2, 3, and 4 will rotate the camera around the cursor by 45 degrees.
  • Click and drag the arrows above a block to move it along the corresponding axis.
  • By right clicking a block, you can select a group of blocks (a "compound") or set the spawn point.
  • Play lets you explore the level you created.
